synopsis.text: Girls, a mobile game by CloverWorks, commemorates its fifth anniversary with an energetic music video featuring the original song 'Go Just Go!'. The animated commercial, produced by the renowned studio CloverWorks, showcases the vibrant and captivating world of the popular game, THE iDOLM@STER: Cinderella Girls - Starlight Stage. The full version of 'Go Just Go!' can be found on THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS STARLIGHT MASTER GOLD RUSH! 01 Go Just Go!, inviting fans to immerse themselves in the lively rhythm and engaging melodies of this celebratory track.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
